name: Spacefarers!
description: As we traverse into the stars! In the early 1900s, humanity eagerly predicted a technological future. As society progressed ever more, humanity became a space-faring civilization. The year is 2017, the vast universe is in your grasp. With Spacefarers! the universe is in your hands!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10 Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 256mb Video Memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
